column1: Down with fever will not be working today
Son is not well so will be not working
Having headache and need some rest
I have some emergency work I have to go now
I couldnt continue my day today as I have to go to bank
I have some important personal meeting will meet you tomorrow
My parents have come here so I have to be with them I will see you tomorrow
Doctor advised me take rest so I have to do the same I will start work after my health improves
Throat infection couldnt talk so will resume work after thoart clears
I am leaving now will see you day after tomorrow
I am not well today I am Sick
I have a dentist appointment and I cannot make it today
I don’t think I’ll be able to make it to office today because my little child is very sick
I need to take my father/mother to their doctor’s appointment so not coming to office today
One of my relative is passed away and I have to go and I cant come to the office
Stuck in office and I cant attend the meeting
Some wood work is going at home and I cant make it today
There is no water at home and I cant make it to the office
Some paper work I have to do today and will try to login from home
There is no internet due to rain Will start my work if it resumes
Daycare is closed and I have to look after my kid will login tomorrow
We have a family function on next week so I am off for a week
I have to attend the conference meet on Feb 20th so I will not work
I had a knee injury I don’t think I will be able to come on today
Something urgent has come up Actually I have to leave immediately out of townSo give me excuse for one day
I have to visit my child's school so need a day off
Got back very late last night as I ma out of town and didn’t manage to come back early I need a rest today
My train got late and I just reached homeCan you won’t mind giving a day off
I need to take my brother to the hospital and can’t leave him until he is treatedCan I please?
Just missed a bus or a train! And now I need to wait for one hour Either I can take a leave or reach late in office
I have to go for a blood donation on Feb 29th so Can I have a off on that day?
Relative has come to our house and I have to take them out for some personal work I will come tomorrow
My sister is blessed with a baby boy and I have to be therePlease manage the situation I will be back after a day
my son’s annual sports day and prize distribution ceremony is timed exactly at the off time of our office So I cannot make it on time
I am in Adhar card office and in the queue waiting for my turn due to process of getting new card I will be back in another three hours
I had applied for the renewal of the passport and just now I had received their call to collect the passportPlease allow me to go
As I am going for a trip and my leave starts from today
I am not well and I am not working today
Taking off today
I am unable to come to office today because of unpredictable weather
As I have to take my mother for her monthly checkup to hospital and I am not sure how much time it will take Kindly allow me the leave
I have to attend the Annual Parents Teachers Meeting of my elder son I need a short leave for 2 hours on account of this today I will come to office at 11 am instead of 9 am
I just wanted to let you know that I am not felling well and I cannot come to office I want to take off for today
I am shifting from the flat to the house today So it would not be feasible for me to come to office today
I am in need of an urgent short leave because my presence is urgently needed at the time of the admission of my son
My mother is in the hospital she is needing bloodPlease free me for that time period Much thanks
my wife’s uncle died todaygrant me leave to make it possible for me to join the funeral procession
my wife’s uncle died today grant me to make it possible for me to join the funeral procession
I had eaten raw cooked food yesterday and now I am suffering from food poisoning Kindly grant me the leave so that I can check myself from the doctor
I had eaten raw cooked food yesterday and now I am suffering from food poisoning Give me one day time I can check myself from the doctor
my mother is sick and feeling nausea She is not feeling well so retire me from my work for the first half as I would be with her at the hospital
I want a half leave from my work today as I need to open new account in the nearby Bank
I would not be available for the meeting today in office
I feel very nauseating It seems that I need rest for one day
my sister has fell down from stairs in school and sustained some injuries Therefore I won’t be able to come today
